title: Logitech G502 Lightspeed Wireless - A Gaming Mouse Far From Home?
description: Logitech has updated their G502 gaming mouse to include Lightspeed wireless technology and Powerplay wireless charging.  But those add up and push this mouse's price far from home, making it almost double what the G502 Hero costs.  In this review we'll see if the G502 Lightspeed is worth it and if those changes make this the best PC gaming mouse of 2019.
